item.title: Warner Bros favours Netflix offer over $108bn Paramount bid
item.description: Warner Brothers says the offer for its film and streaming businesses is inferior to Netflix's.

item.title: Macclesfield forward McLeod dies in car accident
item.description: Macclesfield forward Ethan McLeod has died in a car accident on the M1 motorway while travelling back from a game.

item.title: Caesarean sections overtake natural vaginal births for the first time
item.description: Experts say there is a complex picture behind why more babies are being delivered through surgery.

item.title: Police forces will make arrests over 'globalise the intifada' chants
item.description: The Metropolitan and Greater Manchester forces say they will make arrests over 'globalise the intifada' chants.

item.title: Nato spending pledge is Trump's biggest foreign policy success, Rutte tells BBC
item.description: The Nato chief said it was thanks to Donald Trump that the alliance is "stronger than it ever was".
